text: Pedro León Zapata (February 27, 1929 – February 6, 2015) was a prominent Venezuelan artist, humorist and cartoonist. He was born in La Grita, Táchira. Zapata died in Caracas, Venezuela at the age of 85.Muere a los 85 años el caricaturista venezolano Pedro León Zapata ==References== ==Other websites== *Interview with Zapata "This revolution does not make me laugh", from the Newspaper "Tal Cual" (2003). title: Pedro León Zapata
